sentences.english: It is this love that knows no separation. To it, far is near.

sentences.english: She would go to the ends of the earth to make a better life for the family .

sentences.english: His library displayed miscellanea of mementos from different parts of the world, a lifetime of traveling.

sentences.english: The sun was setting west, along with tears of someone at the edge of the world.

sentences.english: The cloud stood humbly in a corner of the sky, The morning crowned it with splendour.

Shi led a wandering life for a long time.
